website_summaries.verdict: Mixing traditional features with a bit of minimalist flair is the concept behind the Asics Gel Pursuit 2. Asics has hit the ball out of the park as the shoe delivers good arch support, sufficient cushioning and unbelievable comfort without having to spend more than necessary.
pros: The comfort provided by the Pursuit 2 comes mainly because of its amazing fit
The versatility offered by the Gel Pursuit 2 is appreciated by most runners
A few testers believed that it’s a great option for entry-level runners
Traction is superb on the road, noted a handful of users
It has sufficient cushioning, yet it still promotes natural running movement
A good transition shoe for those looking for a more minimalist experience
cons: The grip needs improvement when conditions get wet, according to a handful of runners
Some wearers noted that the forefoot area and the toe box are narrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but something wrong somewhere
customer_reviews.text: On first trying these on they felt so comfortable and right although the laces are very short and its tricky to tie a normal knot let alone double knot them. But I simply cannot run more than a mile in these without getting severe heel blisters. I have tried several times now with different socks, heel lock lacing, lacing tight and loose etc and each time I end up limping home in pain. I am a fairly experienced runner and have never had this problem before with any shoe. £40 down the drain as I have no choice but to bin these/give them away.
customer_reviews.author: 0ddball

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit gel trainers by Asics
customer_reviews.text: As my first pair of real running trainers, these are excellent for my feet. A near perfect fit, and when jogging a short distance they proved great trainers. I received them this morning. One day post, so very quick. A nice wide fit, perfect for the running machine. I did 24 minutes just to see. Excellent compression and wrap a round for my feet. I will be buy one more pair, but I will choose a different colour set. A very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.PaulZ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and fit as expected. I've just started running and have had a few runs where I've had pain under the arch of my foot but this is probably down to technique (or lack of). Delivery quick and as expected
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for general wear. Love Asics for the fit and comfort. My running days are over so can't justify the big prices. These are great value. Good service and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: capbin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bargain
customer_reviews.text: I was looking fr a different shoe but these were such a bargain that.i couldn't resist. Quite right design but got used to that quickly. Have worn them a few times and they are comfortable and supportive. I wear orthotics and there was no problem taking out the insoles and replacing with my orthotics. I have worn Asics previously and am encouraged now to buy them again in the future
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainer, so comfortable as I have arch problems
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainer, so comfortable as I have arch problems. These really helped as they make walking a lot better, will definitely buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My favourite pair of shoes, they fit well and are so comfortable they are all I wear. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tight
customer_reviews.text: Much too small for size 7. My husband usually wears 6.5 and size 7 trainers are most of the time quite roomy for him. So this one was rather disappointing, since the style and colours were so appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favourite running shoes. If I can find another pair I would have them today.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice and value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable fit. Good shoe for all aspects of the gym.
customer_reviews.author: David Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few different pairs of running shoes over the years and these are an excellent pair of shoes. They fit as expected. Comfortable and nice spring when running. Excellent price and quick delivery too
customer_reviews.author: S A FRENCH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, delivered on time and well packaged, would recommend very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and really comfortable. This is my second pair. Regards Bryan
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This is my third pair of these running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these running shoes. \they suit mu broad feet well/ I am fond of the style and comfort of them
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great gym trainers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gym shoes if you wanted to do serious running these are not what you need. But over all I am always happy with asics trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Mumraa27

customer_reviews.title: Quality running trainers
customer_reviews.text: Would never run in anything else. Asics are always top quality and these are no different. Ran 10km in them straight out the box, very comfortable and supportive very happy
customer_reviews.author: K. C

customer_reviews.title: These are the best running shoes I have to date
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I have to date. I suffer badly from plantar fasciitis and with these shoes I did not need my insoles. In fact i have bought another pair to wear for all the time I am not running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for Gym or everyday use, smart looking too
customer_reviews.author: stuartstubbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair as I was so delighted with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. H. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice and light. And comfortable when running. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave g

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: replacement of my old asics gel trainers, fit perfect and comfortable from the off and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: mark jones

customer_reviews.title: Do the job well
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, very comfy! Carried me though 10k, all good.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Such a superb comfortable shoe at a decent price, really quick delivery. Can't fault it and would get from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Nice design. What you would expect from Asics.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Shoe, got it 1/2 a size bigger just in case and fits perfectly. very comfy to run in.
customer_reviews.author: matt vanston

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of affordable running trainers
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of affordable running trainers. I do all sorts of exercise in these. Very comfortable for short distance running (up to 8 miles) but I think for long distance or marathon training you'd want something with a little more comfort support. While the back of these is a decent support, it is quite rigid before you break them in. After a week or so though, they soften up (I dont mean the support goes). I still wear these after a year...great shoes! Love the vibrant colours.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Gel-Pursuit 2 runner
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and quick delivery. Asics lightweight breathable mesh running shoe with internal heel counter for stability. So far it's after trying, hope it will stay that way for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Price and fit excellent, colour, eh, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in fit and cushioning. Not my first choice for colour but significantly cheaper than other colour schemes.
customer_reviews.author: Wowbagger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect packaging, delivered on time and the product itself ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect packaging, delivered on time and the product itself appears to be of good quality. The shoes were comfortable and as it's mainly for running, I found the shock absorbant aspect built into the shoes seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sri Raghavan

customer_reviews.title: great product and a really perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: great product and a really perfect fit. My husband had some before so was looking for the same make. he was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: goldenfd

customer_reviews.title: Supports and for the price I think these are the best budget trainers for my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Serious running trainers and hard to get knocked over with these bright things. Supports and for the price I think these are the best budget trainers for my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-Pursuit 2, Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These gel-pursuit 2 training shoes by asics are designed to be reliable and comfortable. They feature a upper design made of breathable mesh that keeps you cool and offers an improved fit. On longer runs, rear foot gel cushions foot on landing and absorbs shock. Trusstic improves efficiency by guiding your foot through the gait cycle. Other features include removable sock liner and gives comfort and stability with california slip lasting.
